kpi.name: M1008C301

kpi_info.title: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
kpi_info.use: "The number of failed Multi-Band Load Balancing (MBLB) IFHOs due to UTRAN. This is a common failure counter for attempt counters M1008C296, M1008C297, M1008C298 and M1008C299. UPDATED: When the preparation phase for IFHO fails. It can be either SRNS resource reservation failure (intra-RNC case) or RANAP: RELOCATION PREPARATION FAILURE (inter-RNC case)."

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
